RIP photographers.

AI turns bad pics into professional headshots:

✦ Go to Gemini (it's the ChatGPT of Google).
✦ Make sure to have a (bad) picture of you.
✦ Then copy and paste this prompt:

Prompt: "First ask me for a selfie. Transform my selfie into a fresh but professional image suitable for a social media profile. The lighting should be natural, flattering, and multidimensional. My head is slightly tilted so it doesn't look stiff and it should look like I'm in a modern, bright office with a blurred background."

Gemini image guide: https://lnkd.in/d7xW8Qze.

My favorite AI for images: https://lnkd.in/dtigJ-Sq.

How to restore old photos: https://lnkd.in/dtePiWa4.
